title: The Arrangement 21: The Ferro Family
description: THE SERIES WITH OVER 12 MILLION COPIES SOLDVolume 21 in the New York Times Bestselling Arrangement SeriesThe sexy billionaire laying next to me has asked me the one question I've been longing to hear. Sean Ferro is finally there, ready to marry me. All I have to do to live happily ever after is destroy my enemies, kill my brother, and try not to lose myself in the process.As it is, I feel like I'm becoming unhinged. Past sins are pressing against my mind, demanding to be dealt with, but I can't open the floodgates. I can't let those demons see the light of day. My actions are so far beyond shades of grey that I worry I'll destroy everyone around me--Sean included.I never thought it would be difficult to say yes to the sexy, naked man laying in my arms. I want the happily ever after, but I'm not sure I have what it takes to get there.Genre: New Adult RomanceThis story unfolds over multiple volumes approx. 125 pages each.~The Arrangement Vol 1-21 are on sale now.~23 books total in this series~
author: H.M. Ward
